Token.Abstract: PPHAccessController helps you build OAuth authentication into your app. PLEASE NOTE: In order to implement proper security, you should create a server similar to the sample server included in this SDK to store your app secret server-side (only).
Once you get an access_token and merchant info, pass it into setupMerchant and we'll verify PayPal Here setup and save their credentials.

Parameter.Name: account
Parameter.Abstract: The account created as a result of a successful PayPal Access login redirect

Parameter.Name: completionHandler
Parameter.Abstract: Will be called when we have gotten information about the account (eligibility, identity)

Token.Abstract: Refresh a PPHAccessAccount token using the refreshurl. If successful, the accesstoken will be updated

Parameter.Name: account
Parameter.Abstract: the account for which the refreshurl should be used to get a new accesstoken
